about_the_game:
Scars Above Stories & Art
This e-book has three short stories about the Scars team.
The first covers the appearance of the Metahedron and what it meant for our protagonist Kate.
The second examines the mission and how the launch of the spaceship Hermes came about.
While the third tells you what happened to the Hermes and its crew after they were transported by the Metahedron.

Caution: Since this story contains spoilers, it is best to read the third story only after you have completed the second chapter in the game!
The book also contains concept art, drawings and breakdown all the creatures you’ll face – along with their weaknesses.
